sentences.en: A third example is the ferrous sulphide which we mentioned in the previous chapter.
sentences.cn: 第三个例子是前章提到的硫化亚铁.

sentences.en: Add Ferroin indicator and titrate with 0.025 N ferrous ammonium sulphate solution.
sentences.cn: 加入亚铁菲绕啉离子,用滴定法测量硫酸亚铁铵溶液.

sentences.en: Baths are ferrous chloride electrolyte and contain L - ascorbic acid as additive.
sentences.cn: 在低碳钢带上电沉积铁,抗坏血酸用作氯化亚铁镀液的添加剂.

sentences.en: Conversion of ferrous to ferric iron occurs readily upon aeration at PH 7 . 0 - 7. 5.
sentences.cn: 在PH值 7.0―7.5时,一经曝气亚铁离子很容易转化为铁离子.

sentences.en: EMCUT 178 will stain non - ferrous metals due to its high chemical activity.
sentences.cn: EMCUT178由于其高度的化学活性,会对 非 铁金属造成蚀斑.

sentences.en: Ferrous alloy . A metal alloy for which iron is the prime constituent.
sentences.cn: 铁为主要组成的金属合金.

sentences.en: Ferrous alloy is one of important and indispensable raw materials of steelmaking.
sentences.cn: 铁合金是炼钢的重要和不可缺少的原材料之一.

sentences.en: Ferrous metals , timber, and pulp seem to offer the main field of reduction.
sentences.cn: 看来,黑色金属 、 木材和纸浆是削减的重要对象.

sentences.en: Glass is separated by hand at the dump and ferrous metal removed by magnet.
sentences.cn: 玻璃在堆放场用手拣出,黑色金属用磁铁分出.

sentences.en: Nodules contain a mixture of ferrous and ferrous - oxy leghemoglobin.
sentences.cn: 根瘤含有亚铁和亚铁一氧化豆血红蛋白的混合物.

sentences.en: Non - ferrous resources such as gold stocks shares why crazy?
sentences.cn: 黄金股等有色资源股为何如此疯狂?

sentences.en: The physicochemical characteristics of ferrous glycinate were evaluated by a storage test.
sentences.cn: 通过贮藏试验,研究了甘氨酸螯合铁的理化性质.

sentences.en: The practicability of ferrous - sulfate electrolytic method has been further confirmed.
sentences.cn: 对于在大气下电解的硫酸亚铁电解法的实用性,也进一步得到肯定.

sentences.en: The water was reacting with the ferrous iron in the tank.
sentences.cn: 水与水箱中的铁质产生化学反应.

sentences.en: To be applied directly on rusted ferrous metal surfaces.
sentences.cn: 可直接于带锈钢铁表面.
